data.title: The Chapel
data.meta_description: Feature film - Drama - The Chapel is the story of Lia Rogiers, a young piano virtuoso who participates in the famous Queen Elisabeth Competition. During this actual event, the 12 finalists are isolated in the chapel for seven days. Any contact with the outside world is forbidden. Lia is stressed from the competition and the isolation. Bad memories start to resurface.

Majority

Synopsis

The Chapel is the story of Lia Rogiers, a young piano virtuoso who participates in the famous Queen Elisabeth Competition. During this actual event, the 12 finalists are isolated in the chapel for seven days. Any contact with the outside world is forbidden. Lia is stressed from the competition and the isolation. Bad memories start to resurface.
